modName: Dragonborn comes cover - bard song replacement
descriptionHtml:
Replaced the dragonborn comes song from the bard in the winking skeever ( lisette ) in solitude with an awesome cover of it ( video in the video section )
She doesn\'t really sing yet or play the lute but i can\'t do anything more untill the creation kit is out.

Also, i don\'t know why this mod was removed maybe because the mods thought i did not have permission for the song, just to let everyone know. I HAVE PERMISSION TO USE THAT SONG!

Now, enjoy it!
author: Roxas666 or Tripl3SixT0MM7
